Header: Sajith Premadasa signs an Environment Charter
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st0)-New Democratic Front Presidential Candidate Sajith Premadasa signed an Environmental Charter at a convention in Colombo today (November 1). The Environment Charter was made public after the Presidential Candidate of the New Democratic Front Sajith Premadasa placed their signature. The charter includes proposals to establish a presidential task force prioritizing environmental conservation, wildlife conservation and to increase forest density. Establish an Earth Sciences University and thereby initiate university studies related to environmental activities such as wildlife conservation and climate change. Adopting a sustainable economic development pattern through a sustainable environmental and wildlife policy while bringing together environmental groups, environmental organizations and all stakeholders. The Charter includes proposals to protect wildlife species such as wild elephants and blue whales, protect all biological systems as a community-centric program. Academics, officials, and professionals associated with the field of environment and wildlife attended the event.
